topics.body:
Awwwww; I just read a manga about a android falling in love with a human getting rejected and going through heartbreak and going insane cause she doesn't understand the feeling.  Now I feel sad.

*random thought pops in my head*
Now I just made myself double sad cause when we eventually do get androids imagine how many people are going to be buying them and then throwing them out whenever new models come out with the androids sitting in the garbage dumps all communicating with each other about how much they like their owners and how they're all waiting for them to come pick them up slowly running out of battery life with the last things being processed being, "I can't wait for my owner to pick me up; he's such a nice person" and their owners going to the store to buy a newer model instead after throwing their old one out.

*Remembers that part in Chobits where that guy refused to buy a newer model cause he cared for his android and watched as she slowly performance wise started deteriorating and the last thing she did was push her owner away from a oncoming bus sacrificing herself to save him.

Awww; I just made myself triple sad: I'm going to get some icecream levels sad.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
